warnings.raw_message: Wind shear warning in effect for all runways. Low-level wind shear associated with cold frontal passage. Significant airspeed fluctuations expected on approach and departure below 2000ft AGL.

Thunderstorm warning in effect. Active cumulonimbus with frequent lightning within 32km radius. NW-SE oriented squall line associated with cold front passage. Ground operations should be suspended immediately.

Strong wind warning. Cold front squall producing sustained winds 310/35KT with gusts to 50-55KT. Wind shifting westerly 20-30KT following frontal passage. Exercise extreme caution during all ground handling and aircraft movement.
